name: ng-hashtag-search-box
description: Hashtag search box with inline suggestion

scripts.build: mkdir -p dist && uglifyjs src/directive.js --source-map dist/ng-hashtag-search-box.js.map --source-map-root /node_modules/ng-hashtag-search-box/dist --source-map-url /node_modules/ng-hashtag-search-box/dist/ng-hashtag-search-box.js.map --source-map-include-sources -o dist/ng-hashtag-search-box.min.js -c --comments

author: Ivan Fraixedes <ivan@fraixed.es> (http://ivan.fraixed.es)
